pkgmetadata.longdescription: Microsoft Azure CLI 'advisor' Command Module============================================This package is for the 'advisor' module.i.e. 'az advisor'.. :changelog:Release History===============2.0.1++++++* Minor fixes.2.0.0++++++* GA release.0.6.0+++++* BREAKING CHANGE: 'show' commands log error message and fail with exit code of 3 upon a missing resource.0.5.2++++++* Minor fixes.0.5.1+++++* `sdist` is now compatible with wheel 0.31.00.5.0++++++* BC: `advisor configuration get` has been renamed to `advisor configuration list`.* BC: `advisor configuration set` has been renamed to `advisor configuration update`.* BC: `advisor recommendation generate` has been removed.* `advisor recommendation list` has a new --refresh parameter.* `advisor recommendation show` has been added.* Support Autorest 3.0 based SDKs0.1.2+++++* Minor fixes.0.1.1++++++* Update for CLI core changes.0.1.0+++++* Initial release of module.
